about.title: About Me
about.bio1: I've been programming since 2022. I specialize in creating Telegram bots, websites and mobile applications. 50+ projects successfully completed.
about.bio2: Before starting each project, I develop a detailed technical specification with you. This saves your time and money, and the result is even better than expected.

form.name: Your Name

success.title: Message sent!

quickResponse.title: Quick Response
quickResponse.message: I usually respond within 2-3 hours. Telegram is the fastest way to contact.

freeConsultation.title: Free Consultation
freeConsultation.message: Let's discuss your project and find the best solution. Consultation is absolutely free!
